meanings.definition: Not uniform or consistent in composition or structure.
meanings.sent1: The cake had an inhomogeneous texture, with some parts being dense and others fluffy.
meanings.sent2: The artist used an inhomogeneous mix of colors to create a unique painting.
meanings.sent3: The inhomogeneous distribution of toppings on the pizza made it look like a work of abstract art.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like an inhomogeneous puzzle, scattered and difficult to piece together.
meanings.sent5: The inhomogeneous landscape was a patchwork of different shades of green, brown, and yellow.

meanings.definition: Composed of different elements or parts.
meanings.sent1: The inhomogeneous mixture of spices created a unique flavor in the dish.
meanings.sent2: The team was an inhomogeneous group of individuals with diverse backgrounds and skills.
meanings.sent3: The inhomogeneous blend of music genres in the playlist made for an interesting listening experience.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was an inhomogeneous collection of vintage and modern clothing.
meanings.sent5: The inhomogeneous crowd at the concert was a mix of young and old, dancing and swaying to the music.
